extends Object

      • addCertificateProfile

        public int addCertificateProfile​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                 String name,
                                 CertificateProfile profile)
                          throws CertificateProfileExistsException,
                                 AuthorizationDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: CertificateProfileSession
        Adds a certificate profile to the database.
        Specified by:
        addCertificateProfile in interface CertificateProfileSession
        Parameters:
        admin - administrator performing the task
        name - readable name of new certificate profile
        profile - the profile to be added
        Returns:
        the generated certificate profile id
        Throws:
        CertificateProfileExistsException - if the profile already exists
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if admin is not authorized to edit certificate profile

      • addCertificateProfile

        public int addCertificateProfile​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                 int id,
                                 String name,
                                 CertificateProfile profile)
                          throws CertificateProfileExistsException,
                                 AuthorizationDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: CertificateProfileSession
        Adds a certificate profile to the database.
        Specified by:
        addCertificateProfile in interface CertificateProfileSession
        Parameters:
        admin - administrator performing the task
        id - internal ID of new certificate profile, use only if you know it's right.
        name - readable name of new certificate profile
        profile - the profile to be added
        Returns:
        the generated certificate profile id
        Throws:
        CertificateProfileExistsException - if the profile already exists
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if admin is not authorized to edit certificate profile

                                                         CertificateProfile profile)
                                                  throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: CertificateProfileSession

      • cloneCertificateProfile

        public void cloneCertificateProfile​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                    String orgname,
                                    String newname,
                                    List<Integer> authorizedCaIds)
                             throws CertificateProfileExistsException,
                                    CertificateProfileDoesNotExistException,
                                    AuthorizationDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: CertificateProfileSession
        Adds a certificate profile with the same content as the original certificate profile.
        Specified by:
        cloneCertificateProfile in interface CertificateProfileSession
        Parameters:
        admin - Administrator performing the operation
        orgname - name of old certificate profile
        newname - name of new certificate profile
        authorizedCaIds - list of CAid to replace the original list with, or null.
        Throws:
        CertificateProfileExistsException - If a profile already exists with the new name
        CertificateProfileDoesNotExistException - if the profile with the given ID didn't exist.
        AuthorizationDeniedException - If access denied

      • getAuthorizedCertificateProfileIds

        public List<Integer> getAuthorizedCertificateProfileIds​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                                        int certprofiletype)
        Description copied from interface: CertificateProfileSession
        Retrieves a Collection of id:s (Integer) to authorized profiles. Only profiles that refer to CA's that the authentication token is authorized to will be returned.
        Specified by:
        getAuthorizedCertificateProfileIds in interface CertificateProfileSession
        Parameters:
        admin - Administrator performing the operation
        certprofiletype - should be either CertificateConstants.CERTTYPE_ENDENTITY, CertificateConstants.CERTTYPE_SUBCA, CertificateConstants.CERTTYPE_ROOTCA, CertificateConstants.CERTTYPE_HARDTOKEN (i.e EndEntity certificates and Hardtoken fixed profiles) or CertificateConstants.CERTTYPE_UNKNOWN for all. Retrieves certificate profile names sorted.
        Returns:
        Collection of id:s (Integer)

      • getAuthorizedCertificateProfileWithMissingCAs

        public List<Integer> getAuthorizedCertificateProfileWithMissingCAs​(AuthenticationToken admin)
        Description copied from interface: CertificateProfileSession
        Retrieves a Collection of id:s (Integer) of all certificate profiles which have non-existent CA Ids. This requires access to the root resource (i.e. superadmin access). If access is denied then an empty list is returned.
        Specified by:
        getAuthorizedCertificateProfileWithMissingCAs in interface CertificateProfileSession
        Parameters:
        admin - Auth token
        Returns:
        List

        Specified by:
        getCertificateProfile in interface CertificateProfileSession
        Parameters:
        id - certificate profile id
        Returns:

      • initializeAndUpgradeProfiles

        public void initializeAndUpgradeProfiles()
        Description copied from interface: CertificateProfileSession
        A method designed to be called at startuptime to (possibly) upgrade certificate profiles. This method will read all Certificate Profiles and as a side-effect upgrade them if the version changed.
        Specified by:
        initializeAndUpgradeProfiles in interface CertificateProfileSession

      • renameCertificateProfile

                                     String oldname,
                                     String newname)
                              throws CertificateProfileExistsException,
                                     AuthorizationDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: CertificateProfileSession
        Renames a certificate profile
        Specified by:
        renameCertificateProfile in interface CertificateProfileSession
        Parameters:
        admin - Admin
        oldname - the name of the certificate profile to rename
        newname - the new name of the certificate profile
        Throws:
        CertificateProfileExistsException - If a profile with the new name already exists
        AuthorizationDeniedException - If access denied

                                     String name)
                              throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: CertificateProfileSession
        Removes a certificate profile from the database, does not throw any errors if the profile does not exist.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        admin - Administrator performing the operation
        name - the name of the certificate profile to remove

      • existsCAIdInCertificateProfiles

        public boolean existsCAIdInCertificateProfiles​(int caid)
        Description copied from interface: CertificateProfileSession
        Method to check if a CA id exists in any of the certificate profiles. Used to avoid desyncronization of CA data.
        Specified by:
        existsCAIdInCertificateProfiles in interface CertificateProfileSession
        Parameters:
        caid - the caid to search for.
        Returns:
        true if ca exists in any of the certificate profiles.

      • existsPublisherIdInCertificateProfiles

        public boolean existsPublisherIdInCertificateProfiles​(int publisherid)
        Description copied from interface: CertificateProfileSession
        Method to check if a Publisher id exists in any of the certificate profiles. Used to avoid desynchronization of publisher data.
        Specified by:
        existsPublisherIdInCertificateProfiles in interface CertificateProfileSession
        Parameters:
        publisherid - the publisherid to search for.
        Returns:
        true if publisher exists in any of the certificate profiles.

      • authorizedToProfileWithResource

        public boolean authorizedToProfileWithResource​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                                               CertificateProfile profile,
                                               boolean logging,
                                               String... resources)
        Description copied from interface: CertificateProfileSessionLocal
        Checks authorization to profiles. Only profiles that refer to CA's that the authentication token is authorized to will be OK. Also checks the passed in extra resources. Does this in a single call to authorizationSession to keep it efficient
        Specified by:
        authorizedToProfileWithResource in interface CertificateProfileSessionLocal
        Parameters:
        admin - Administrator performing the operation
        profile - Certificate Profile that we want to check authorization for
        logging - if we should log access or not
        resources - additional resources to check, for example StandardRules.CERTIFICATEPROFILEEDIT.resource()
        Returns:
        true if authorized to the profile and the resources

      • getProfileAsXml

        public byte[] getProfileAsXml​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                              int profileId)
                       throws CertificateProfileDoesNotExistException,
                              AuthorizationDeniedException
        Description copied from interface: CertificateProfileSession
        Returns the given certificate profile in XML format
        Specified by:
        getProfileAsXml in interface CertificateProfileSession
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - the administrator requesting the action
        profileId - the id of the certificate profile
        Returns:
        the certificate profile encoded as XML
        Throws:
        CertificateProfileDoesNotExistException - if the profile with the given ID didn't exist.
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if the profile contained CAs that the admin wasn't authorized to, or the admin wasn't authorized to view profiles
